run.reason: TDD red phase - tests created before implementation
run.output: Tests not yet executed. This is the TDD red phase where tests are written before implementation. All tests are expected to fail until the Tauri v2 upgrade is implemented.

expected_failures.reason: Core Tauri dependencies still on beta versions
Plugins still use git dependencies, not stable crates.io/npm versions
specta and tauri-specta still on rc versions

expected_failures.test: should have required build scripts defined
expected_failures.reason: Build scripts exist but will fail with stable v2 until dependencies upgraded
Configuration may need updates for stable v2 schema

expected_failures.test: should use stable npm versions for plugins
expected_failures.reason: Plugins currently use github references instead of npm versions

next_steps: Implement Tauri v2 stable upgrade by updating package.json and Cargo.toml
Replace git plugin dependencies with stable npm/crates.io versions
Regenerate TypeScript bindings with stable specta/tauri-specta
Update tauri.conf.json if schema changed in stable v2
Run tests and iterate until all pass (TDD green phase)
Verify cross-platform builds on Windows, macOS, and Linux
notes: This is a TDD red phase - tests are intentionally written to fail
Tests drive the implementation by defining expected behavior
Many tests are skipped (it.skip) as they require running Tauri application
Once dependencies are upgraded, run: cargo test && pnpm test
Expect initial failures, then fix implementation until tests pass
